title: Hope Burns
description: Molly Burnett and Carter Richards share a painful past, one that sent Molly running out of town, vowing never to return. The only thing bringing her back is her sister's wedding, and she doesn't intend to stay long.But circumstances force her to remain in town, and within close distance of the one man who hurt her more than she'd ever been hurt before. Can the two of them face down the past and work together toward the possibility of love and happiness in Hope?This is a series to warm your heart, it's all about second chances at love, first loves reunited, and finding love when and where you least expect it.
author: Jaci Burton
